title: Airdrieonians 1-0 Brechin: Match Report
text: Airdrieonians 1-0 Brechin: Match Report 17 Oct 2015 17:01:00 Liam Watt strike hands Airdrie victory over BrechinAirdrie dug in to see off a revitalised Brechin side 1-0 at the Excelsior Stadium.The Glebe Park side had responded to losing their first eight fixtures with a handy three-match unbeaten run, and troubled the hosts with early efforts from Robert Thomson and Craig Molloy.In truth it was a drab first half, but it took Airdrie just two minutes to break the deadlock after the interval. Liam Watt planted his right foot nicely on a Taylor Morgan cross to give Gary Bollan's men the edge.Both sides had plenty of half chances in the remainder of the match, but the hosts worked hard to end a three-match winless streak.
